text: Helmut Robert Duckadam (1 April 1959 â€“ 2 December 2024) was a Romanian footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He made two appearances for the Romania national football team in 1982. Duckadam died on 2 December 2024 in Bucharest, Romania at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Romanian footballers
